description:
It appears that handkerchiefs are made to be enjoyed. Hakuya`s troubles continue from last week. Niko spots a UMA. It`s important to stay on guard even in the evening hours. Meanwhile, Kobeni and Hakuya grow closer. They go on a date (with a child along). The first step to delinquency is made.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハンカチを楽しんでるのよ
